Princess.\""},{"lineNumber":71201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにはともあれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway,\""},{"lineNumber":71202,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これをきっかけにゼスにいた","translatedEnglishLine":"\"because of this, in Zeth,\""},{"lineNumber":71203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様と敵対するように","translatedEnglishLine":"\"she came to oppose Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":71204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最初は運も力も恵まれたランス様を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At first, Lord Rance, blessed with both luck and strength,\""},{"lineNumber":71205,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっと面白がって気に入ってる節も","translatedEnglishLine":"\"somewhat found interesting and liked him,\""},{"lineNumber":71206,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少しはあったんだけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"but only a little.\""},{"lineNumber":71207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カミーラ様の使徒を、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But when her apostle follower,\""},{"lineNumber":71209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その敵対は決定的なものに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"their hostility became decisive.\""},{"lineNumber":71210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最終的には邪魔が入ったこともあり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the end, due to around,\""},{"lineNumber":71213,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんともおかわいそうなカミーラ様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"poor Lady Camilla indeed...\""},{"lineNumber":71214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに魔人ケイブリス様こと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By the way, the demon Kaiburis,\""},{"lineNumber":71215,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケーちゃんさんがずっと求愛してるけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"known as K-chan, has been courting her persistently,\""},{"lineNumber":71216,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カミーラ様には嫌われてるんですって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"but Lady Camilla hates him.\""},{"lineNumber":71217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、可哀想だけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, that's unfortunate, but...\""},{"lineNumber":71218,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カミーラ様の美意識には","translatedEnglishLine":"\"somehow, I can understand why Kamilia's sense of beauty\""},{"lineNumber":71219,"originalJapaneseLine":"　引っかからないのはなんとなーく分かるかも？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"doesn't align with his.\""},{"lineNumber":71220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔の毛玉時代とか可愛いかったでしょうにね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He was probably cute back in his fluffy ball days, though.\""},{"lineNumber":71221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私なら一も二もなくオッケーするのに！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it were me, I'd say yes without hesitation!\""},{"lineNumber":71222,"originalJapaneseLine":"　毛玉時代でも！　今でも！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Both back in his fluffy ball days! And even now!\""},{"lineNumber":71223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、でもカミーラ様に手紙出して、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, but when K-chan sends letters to Lady Camilla,\""},{"lineNumber":71224,"originalJapaneseLine":"　びりびりに破かれる方のケーちゃんさんの","translatedEnglishLine":"\"and she tears them up to shreds,\""},{"lineNumber":71225,"originalJapaneseLine":"　立ち位置もなかなか捨てがたい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"that position of K-chan is also quite endearing!\""},{"lineNumber":71226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっひょー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Woohoo!\""},{"lineNumber":71227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あなたはどっち派かしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Which side do you lean toward?\""},{"lineNumber":71228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーーー！　ワーグ様可愛いー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa---! Lord Warg is so cute!\""},{"lineNumber":71229,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も寝かしつけてー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want you to put me to sleep too!\""},{"lineNumber":71230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってなわけで夢の魔人！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And so, the Dream Demon!\""},{"lineNumber":71231,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ワーグ様のお話よ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is the story of Lord Warg!\""},{"lineNumber":71232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その能力のすごさは本編で見た通り！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The amazing extent of her powers was seen in the main story!\""},{"lineNumber":71233,"originalJapaneseLine":"「体から放出されるフェロモンによって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By releasing pheromones from her body,\""},{"lineNumber":71234,"originalJapaneseLine":"　近くに寄った者を問答無用に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"those who come near are put to sleep without question,\""},{"lineNumber":71235,"originalJapaneseLine":"　寝かしてしまうってんだから恐ろしい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"which is terrifying.\""},{"lineNumber":71236,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやらこの力は本人にも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems even she cannot control this power,\""},{"lineNumber":71237,"originalJapaneseLine":"　制御が出来ないようで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"unable to regulate it herself,\""},{"lineNumber":71238,"originalJapaneseLine":"　長らく人との会話もしてないようね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"and she hasn't spoken with people in a long time.\""},{"lineNumber":71239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、なんとも壮絶な人生」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, truly a harsh life.\""},{"lineNumber":71240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに彼女の能力は人を寝かせるだけでなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By the way, her ability not only puts people to sleep,\""},{"lineNumber":71241,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思い描いた通りの夢を見せたり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"but also lets them see dreams exactly as she envisions,\""},{"lineNumber":71242,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その力を利用して記憶の操作もできるみたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"and she can manipulate memories using this power.\""},{"lineNumber":71243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実はやろうと思ったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Actually, if she wanted to,\""},{"lineNumber":71244,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回の戦争を根本から覆すことも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"she could overturn this entire war from the root.\""},{"lineNumber":71245,"originalJapaneseLine":"　可能なんでしょうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is probably possible.\""},{"lineNumber":71246,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However...\""},{"lineNumber":71247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本人が誰よりも自分の能力を嫌ってるから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"she hates her own ability more than anyone else,\""},{"lineNumber":71248,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その力が存分に振るわれることは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"so it is quite rare for her to use her power to its fullest.\""},{"lineNumber":71249,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かなり稀なことなんですって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is a very rare occurrence.\""},{"lineNumber":71250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「近くに誰も寄ることが出来ず、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No one can come near her,\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで四天王の一角！　ドラゴン魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And so, one of the Four Heavenly Kings! The Dragon Demon!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラ様のお話よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the story of Lady Camilla!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「約三年前、ゼスにてカミーラダークという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About three years ago, there was a great disaster called Camilla Dark in Zeth"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大災害を引き起こした張本人さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She was the very person who caused that catastrophe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その性格は、冷血、怠惰、傲慢。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her personality is cold-blooded, lazy, and arrogant."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言った感じかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something like that, I suppose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カミーラ様は約三年前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About three years ago, Lady Camilla"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類侵攻作戦としてゼスに攻め込んできたの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "invaded Zeth as part of an operation to conquer humanity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人類侵攻というか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, rather than an invasion of humanity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルプリンセス捜索の一環だったのかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "it might have been part of the search for the Little Princess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにはともあれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これをきっかけにゼスにいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "because of this, in Zeth,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と敵対するように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she came to oppose Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初は運も力も恵まれたランス様を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At first, Lord Rance, blessed with both luck and strength,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと面白がって気に入ってる節も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "somewhat found interesting and liked him,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しはあったんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but only a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カミーラ様の使徒を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But when her apostle was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に殺されたと聞き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she heard that Lord Rance had killed Lady Camilla's follower,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その敵対は決定的なものに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "their hostility became decisive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最終的には邪魔が入ったこともあり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end, due to interruptions,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に敗れ、ゼスの迷宮に封印される形に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she was defeated by Lord Rance and sealed in the labyrinth of Zeth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、踏んだり蹴ったりで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, thoroughly beaten and kicked around,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんともおかわいそうなカミーラ様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "poor Lady Camilla indeed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに魔人ケイブリス様こと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, the demon Kaiburis,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケーちゃんさんがずっと求愛してるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "known as K-chan, has been courting her persistently,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラ様には嫌われてるんですって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but Lady Camilla hates him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、可哀想だけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, that's unfortunate, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラ様の美意識には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "somehow, I can understand why Kamilia's sense of beauty"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引っかからないのはなんとなーく分かるかも？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "doesn't align with his."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔の毛玉時代とか可愛いかったでしょうにね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was probably cute back in his fluffy ball days, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私なら一も二もなくオッケーするのに！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it were me, I'd say yes without hesitation!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛玉時代でも！　今でも！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Both back in his fluffy ball days! And even now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でもカミーラ様に手紙出して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but when K-chan sends letters to Lady Camilla,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びりびりに破かれる方のケーちゃんさんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and she tears them up to shreds,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち位置もなかなか捨てがたい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "that position of K-chan is also quite endearing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっひょー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Woohoo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あなたはどっち派かしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Which side do you lean toward?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーーー！　ワーグ様可愛いー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa---! Lord Warg is so cute!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も寝かしつけてー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want you to put me to sleep too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで夢の魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And so, the Dream Demon!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグ様のお話よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the story of Lord Warg!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その能力のすごさは本編で見た通り！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The amazing extent of her powers was seen in the main story!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「体から放出されるフェロモンによって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By releasing pheromones from her body,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くに寄った者を問答無用に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "those who come near are put to sleep without question,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝かしてしまうってんだから恐ろしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "which is terrifying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやらこの力は本人にも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems even she cannot control this power,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 制御が出来ないようで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "unable to regulate it herself,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長らく人との会話もしてないようね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and she hasn't spoken with people in a long time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、なんとも壮絶な人生」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, truly a harsh life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに彼女の能力は人を寝かせるだけでなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, her ability not only puts people to sleep,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い描いた通りの夢を見せたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but also lets them see dreams exactly as she envisions,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力を利用して記憶の操作もできるみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and she can manipulate memories using this power."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実はやろうと思ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Actually, if she wanted to,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の戦争を根本から覆すことも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she could overturn this entire war from the root."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可能なんでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is probably possible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本人が誰よりも自分の能力を嫌ってるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she hates her own ability more than anyone else,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力が存分に振るわれることは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "so it is quite rare for her to use her power to its fullest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり稀なことなんですって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is a very rare occurrence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「近くに誰も寄ることが出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No one can come near her,"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

root.\""},{"lineNumber":71245,"originalJapaneseLine":"　可能なんでしょうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is probably possible.\""},{"lineNumber":71246,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However...\""},{"lineNumber":71247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本人が誰よりも自分の能力を嫌ってるから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"she hates her own ability more than anyone else,\""},{"lineNumber":71248,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その力が存分に振るわれることは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"so it is quite rare for her to use her power to its fullest.\""},{"lineNumber":71249,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かなり稀なことなんですって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is a very rare occurrence.\""},{"lineNumber":71250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「近くに誰も寄ることが出来ず、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No one can come near her,\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで四天王の一角！　ドラゴン魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And so, one of the Four Heavenly Kings! The Dragon Demon!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラ様のお話よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the story of Lady Camilla!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「約三年前、ゼスにてカミーラダークという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About three years ago, there was a great disaster called Camilla Dark in Zeth"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大災害を引き起こした張本人さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She was the very person who caused that catastrophe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その性格は、冷血、怠惰、傲慢。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her personality is cold-blooded, lazy, and arrogant."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言った感じかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something like that, I suppose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カミーラ様は約三年前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About three years ago, Lady Camilla"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類侵攻作戦としてゼスに攻め込んできたの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "invaded Zeth as part of an operation to conquer humanity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人類侵攻というか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, rather than an invasion of humanity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルプリンセス捜索の一環だったのかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "it might have been part of the search for the Little Princess."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにはともあれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これをきっかけにゼスにいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "because of this, in Zeth,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様と敵対するように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she came to oppose Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初は運も力も恵まれたランス様を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At first, Lord Rance, blessed with both luck and strength,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと面白がって気に入ってる節も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "somewhat found interesting and liked him,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しはあったんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but only a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カミーラ様の使徒を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But when her apostle was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に殺されたと聞き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she heard that Lord Rance had killed Lady Camilla's follower,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その敵対は決定的なものに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "their hostility became decisive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最終的には邪魔が入ったこともあり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end, due to interruptions,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に敗れ、ゼスの迷宮に封印される形に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she was defeated by Lord Rance and sealed in the labyrinth of Zeth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、踏んだり蹴ったりで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, thoroughly beaten and kicked around,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんともおかわいそうなカミーラ様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "poor Lady Camilla indeed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに魔人ケイブリス様こと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, the demon Kaiburis,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケーちゃんさんがずっと求愛してるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "known as K-chan, has been courting her persistently,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラ様には嫌われてるんですって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but Lady Camilla hates him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、可哀想だけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, that's unfortunate, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラ様の美意識には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "somehow, I can understand why Kamilia's sense of beauty"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引っかからないのはなんとなーく分かるかも？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "doesn't align with his."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔の毛玉時代とか可愛いかったでしょうにね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was probably cute back in his fluffy ball days, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私なら一も二もなくオッケーするのに！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it were me, I'd say yes without hesitation!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛玉時代でも！　今でも！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Both back in his fluffy ball days! And even now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でもカミーラ様に手紙出して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but when K-chan sends letters to Lady Camilla,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びりびりに破かれる方のケーちゃんさんの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and she tears them up to shreds,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ち位置もなかなか捨てがたい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "that position of K-chan is also quite endearing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっひょー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Woohoo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あなたはどっち派かしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Which side do you lean toward?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーーー！　ワーグ様可愛いー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa---! Lord Warg is so cute!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も寝かしつけてー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want you to put me to sleep too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで夢の魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And so, the Dream Demon!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグ様のお話よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the story of Lord Warg!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その能力のすごさは本編で見た通り！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The amazing extent of her powers was seen in the main story!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「体から放出されるフェロモンによって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By releasing pheromones from her body,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くに寄った者を問答無用に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "those who come near are put to sleep without question,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝かしてしまうってんだから恐ろしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "which is terrifying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやらこの力は本人にも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems even she cannot control this power,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 制御が出来ないようで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "unable to regulate it herself,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長らく人との会話もしてないようね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and she hasn't spoken with people in a long time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、なんとも壮絶な人生」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, truly a harsh life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに彼女の能力は人を寝かせるだけでなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, her ability not only puts people to sleep,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い描いた通りの夢を見せたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but also lets them see dreams exactly as she envisions,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力を利用して記憶の操作もできるみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and she can manipulate memories using this power."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実はやろうと思ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Actually, if she wanted to,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の戦争を根本から覆すことも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she could overturn this entire war from the root."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可能なんでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is probably possible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本人が誰よりも自分の能力を嫌ってるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "she hates her own ability more than anyone else,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力が存分に振るわれることは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "so it is quite rare for her to use her power to its fullest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり稀なことなんですって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is a very rare occurrence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「近くに誰も寄ることが出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No one can come near her,"
